section.title: Customizing Lingo for &CLI;
section.para: To run the &CLI; with custom attributes of the Lingo clustering algorithm:

listitem.para: Use the &DCW; to save the attribute set XML file with the desired Lingo attribute values.

Replace the contents of algorithm-lingo-attributes.xml, located in the /suites directory of the carrot2-mini.jar file, located in the lib/ directory of the CLI distribution, with the XML file saved in the previous step.

section.para: You can use the same procedure to customize other algorithms, e.g. STC.
